metadata.title: CVE-2021-43566 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: All versions of Samba prior to 4.13.16 are vulnerable to a malicious clientusing an SMB1 or NFS race to allow a directory to be created in an area ofthe server file system not exported under the share definition. Note thatSMB1 has to be enabled, or the share also available via NFS in order forthis attack to succeed.

criterions.comment: samba package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
